pr_title: added String to char[] converter and test

timeline.bodyText: I don't believe this is working as intended because beans cannot be defined in the inject module since that needs to be compiled first. Also see @jameskleeh comment
timeline.author: graemerocher

timeline.bodyText: Instead of a bean just for this one converter please add this to one of the existing TypeConverterRegistrar beans
timeline.author: graemerocher
